work.summary: Head of online presence for Ka Leo
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official college newspaper website
Drive, design and build student-community projects for UH Manoa
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

volunteer.organization: Associated Students of the University of Hawaii
volunteer.summary: Allocating ASUH's stock portfolio and student fees towards student activities
highlights: Facilitated the approval and payment of awards for service to members of the senate
Oversaw an investment portfolio of over $11.3 million managed by Graystone Consulting
Successfully recruited over 50 brothers (75% increase) while fostering an alumni support network
Documenting activities and reporting for university and national reports
Participated in local community service projects: Adopt a Highway, NAMIWalks, Walk to Defeat ALS, and Surfrider
